item.title: 中国避开委内瑞拉石油，因为报价越来越贵
item.description: 由于美国对南美产油国的封锁限制了委内瑞拉原油的出口，中国买家本周回避了对委内瑞拉原油的报价。【原文：Chinese buyers shunned offers for Venezuelan crude this week, as a US blockade on the South American producer constrains exports from the South American producer.】

item.title: 印度尼西亚见证外国投资者重返主权债务市场
item.description: 得益于12月份的外国净买盘，投资者克服了此前对新任财政部长和全国骚乱的担忧，印尼政府债券在2025年得以流入。【原文：Indonesia’s government bonds eked out an inflow in 2025 thanks to foreign net buying in December, as investors overcame earlier concerns about a new finance minister and nationwide unrest.】

item.title: 中东石油市场疲软加剧全球疲软迹象
item.description: 中东原油市场进一步显示出疲软迹象，加剧了人们对全球原油供应过剩可能拖累油价下跌的担忧，同时也使亚洲交易商得以摆脱委内瑞拉的事态发展。【原文：The Middle Eastern crude market is showing further signs of weakness, amplifying concerns about a global glut that could drag prices lower, while enabling Asian traders to shrug off developments in Venezuela.】

item.title: 英国的住房危机起源于 20 世纪 30 年代
item.description: 乘坐伦敦地铁大都会线（Metropolitan Line），您很快就会发现自己正穿过一个个带花园的半独立式和独立式住宅区，偶尔还能看到绿油油的田野。而在巴黎或东京，你更有可能看到三至六层高的公寓楼。靠近火车线路和城市内的低层独栋住宅居多，这也是英国景观独具特色的原因。这也是造成英国城市化的因素之一。【原文：Take a trip out on the London Underground’s Metropolitan Line and you soon find yourself passing through neighborhoods of semi-detached and detached houses with gardens, giving way on occasion to green fields. In Paris or Tokyo, you’d be far more likely to be looking out on apartment blocks of three to six stories. The preponderance of low-rise single-family homes close to train lines and within cities is what gives Britain’s landscape its distinctive character. It’s also a factor in one of the】

item.title: 高盛认为中国钢铁产能削减速度低于预期
item.description: 据高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Chinese steel mills face an extended period of depressed margins as efforts to cut capacity in the sector go slower-than-expected, while exports remain high, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: 澳新银行称委内瑞拉石油产量在十年结束前不太可能出现大幅增长
item.description: 据澳大利亚和新西兰银行集团（Australia and New Zealand Banking Group Ltd.）称，押注委内瑞拉石油产量增长的投资者将需要雄厚的资金和耐心，因为老化的基础设施将需要数十亿美元的支出。【原文：Investors betting on growth in Venezuela oil output will need deep pockets and patience, as aging infrastructure will require billions of dollars in spending, according to Australia and New Zealand Banking Group Ltd.】

item.title: 收购公司 Hg 即将达成将 OneStream 私有化的交易
item.description: 据知情人士透露，收购公司 Hg Capital 正在就收购金融软件制造商 OneStream Inc.【原文：Buyout firm Hg Capital is in advanced talks to acquire financial software maker OneStream Inc., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普 "新世界秩序 "下的市场在袭击事件后依然反弹
item.description: 金融市场很快就习惯了唐纳德-特朗普总统对全球军事行动采取的非正统做法。【原文：Financial markets have quickly gotten used to President Donald Trump’s unorthodox approach to military operations around the globe.】

item.title: 日本 10 年期债券销售需求与 12 个月平均水平持平
item.description: 由于高收益率吸引了投资者，日本 10 年期国债拍卖吸引了与 12 个月平均水平相当的需求。【原文：Japan’s 10-year government bond auction drew demand that was in line with its 12-month average as high yields lured investors.】

item.title: AMD 推出面向企业数据中心的新芯片，畅谈市场需求
item.description: 先进微设备公司（Advanced Micro Devices Inc.【原文：Advanced Micro Devices Inc., aiming to make a dent in Nvidia Corp.’s stranglehold on the AI hardware market, announced a new chip for corporate data center use and talked up the attributes of a future generation of products for that market.】

item.title: 全球美元债券销售额激增 610 亿美元后将加速增长
item.description: 周一，全球美元债券发行量激增 610 亿美元，创下近一年来单日发行量之最，亚洲借款人纷纷涌入市场，全球美元债券发行量有望加速增长。【原文：Global dollar bond issuance is poised to accelerate after Monday’s $61 billion surge, the biggest one-day tally in nearly a year, as Asian borrowers storm the market.】

item.title: 据说 TheraVectys 正在酝酿香港上市，这是非中国生物技术公司的罕见举动
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，TheraVectys SA 正在考虑在香港进行首次公开募股，这对一家非中国生物技术公司来说实属罕见，尽管亚洲金融中心掀起了一股上市潮。【原文：TheraVectys SA is considering an initial public offering in Hong Kong, according to people familiar with the matter, a rare move for a non-Chinese biotech firm despite a wave of listings in the Asian financial hub.】

item.title: 中国恒逸推进文莱炼油厂扩建项目
item.description: 中国恒逸石化有限公司（Hengyi Petrochemical Co., Ltd.）将开始扩建其计划已久的文莱炼油厂，这将使其在文莱的产能增加一倍以上，并加剧全球燃料和塑料市场的竞争。【原文：China’s Hengyi Petrochemical Co. will embark on a long-planned expansion of its Brunei oil refinery, more than doubling its capacity in the country and intensifying competition in global markets for fuels and plastics.】

item.title: 库存 "锁定 "美国，铜价飙升至新纪录
item.description: 由于交易商和投资者押注全球市场趋紧，铜价在首次突破每吨 13,000 美元后继续强劲反弹。【原文：Copper extended a powerful rally after bursting through $13,000 a ton for the first time, as traders and investors bet on a tighter global market.】

item.title: ICICI 银行称印度债券面临障碍，股票吸引储蓄
item.description: 印度工业信贷投资银行（ICICI Bank Ltd. ）的一位高级管理人员表示，由于家庭储蓄转向股票以及银行投资规则的改变抑制了对长期债务的需求，印度债券的反弹空间有限。【原文：Indian bonds have limited scope to rally as a shift in household savings to equities and changes to banks’ investment rules dampen demand for long-term debt, according to a senior executive at ICICI Bank Ltd.】

item.title: 菲律宾称通胀上升，宽松周期接近尾声
item.description: 菲律宾央行行长表示，除非经济增长低于预期，否则菲律宾央行将考虑在今年再降息一次（可能在2月份），以结束其宽松周期。【原文：The Philippine central bank will consider one more rate cut this year — possibly in February — to close out its easing cycle, barring worse-than-expected economic growth, according to its governor.】

item.title: 2026 年开局强劲，中国股市涨至四年新高
item.description: 中国股市攀升至多年高点，原因是人工智能驱动的持续上涨以及经济复苏迹象的不断增加，使市场情绪保持乐观。【原文：Chinese stocks climbed to multi-year highs as persistent AI-driven gains and growing signs of an economic recovery kept sentiment upbeat.】

item.title: Jollibee Foods 计划将其国际业务在美国上市
item.description: 随着菲律宾快餐集团加速发展其全球品牌，Jollibee Foods Corp. 计划分拆其国际业务，并于 2027 年底在美国证券交易所上市。【原文：Jollibee Foods Corp. plans to spin off its international business and list it on a US stock exchange by late 2027 as the Philippine fast-food group accelerates the development of its global brand.】

item.title: 交易员将台股杠杆率提升至 2008 年以来最高水平
item.description: 买入台湾股票的杠杆押注升至 17 年来最高水平，在基准股价屡创新高之际凸显了强劲的风险偏好。【原文：Leveraged bets to buy Taiwan stocks rose to the highest level in 17 years, underscoring strong risk appetite as the benchmark trades at record highs.】

item.title: 香港开发商数周内售出 7.5 亿美元豪宅
item.description: 节假日期间，香港的开发商忙得不可开交，因为有钱的买家们都在疯狂购买豪宅。【原文：Developers in Hong Kong were kept busy during the holiday season as rich buyers went on a shopping spree for luxury homes.】

item.title: 调查核安全数据后中部电力股价下跌
item.description: 日本中部电力公司（Chubu Electric Power Co.【原文：Shares of Chubu Electric Power Co. dropped after the Japanese regional utility announced it’s investigating possible misconduct in compiling data critical to the safety of its nuclear power plant.】

item.title: First Brands 债权人指控交易回扣高达 300
item.description: First Brands 集团的一名主要出资人被指控与创始人的兄弟共同策划了一项回扣计划，使这家现已破产的汽车零部件供应商背上了高昂的债务。【原文：A major financier to First Brands Group is accused of orchestrating a kickback scheme with the founder’s brother that loaded the now bankrupt auto-parts supplier with expensive debt.】

item.title: 英伟达认为中国市场对 H200 需求强劲，供应充足
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.）表示，中国客户对 H200 芯片的需求强劲，特朗普政府已表示将考虑让芯片制造商向中国发货。【原文：Nvidia Corp. said it has seen strong demand from customers in China for the H200 chip that the Trump administration has said it will consider letting the chipmaker ship to that country.】

item.title: 英国首席财务官对人工智能促进企业发展越来越乐观
item.description: 超过半数的英国公司财务主管预计人工智能将促进经济增长，这表明人们对该技术改变经济的潜力越来越乐观。【原文：More than half of British companies’ finance chiefs expect artificial intelligence to deliver a growth boost, in a sign of rising optimism over the technology’s potential to transform the economy.】

item.title: 英国零售商协会（BRC）称，英国食品通胀加快，购物者再次受到打击
item.description: 英国零售商协会（British Retail Consortium）称，上个月英国食品通胀率自 8 月份以来首次出现上升，这促使购物者在零售商的关键圣诞交易期寻找物美价廉的商品。【原文：UK food inflation rose for the first time since August last month, the British Retail Consortium said, nudging shoppers to seek value items during the key Christmas trading period for retailers.】

item.title: 马杜罗下台，委内瑞拉债券持有人抱团取暖，偿债希望渺茫
item.description: 周一，委内瑞拉债券价格飙升，该国的一些长期债权人聚集在一起，讨论美国总统尼古拉斯-马杜罗下台将如何影响他们收回对委内瑞拉约 600 亿美元违约债务的部分投资。【原文：As prices on Venezuela’s bonds soared Monday, a group of the country’s longtime creditors huddled to discuss how the US ouster of President Nicolas Maduro will affect their ability to recoup some of their investment in about $60 billion of Venezuela’s defaulted debt.】

item.title: 英特尔展示卷土重来的核心新电脑
item.description: 英特尔公司展示了基于全新设计的处理器的笔记本电脑，这是该芯片制造商为使其产品重新具有竞争力所做努力的一部分。【原文：Intel Corp. showed off laptop computers based on processors with a new design, part of the chipmaker’s effort to make its products competitive again.】

item.title: 一周来最大涨幅后保持稳定，委内瑞拉成为关注焦点
item.description: 由于交易商权衡了委内瑞拉的前景，同时对全球供应过剩的担忧持续存在，石油在创下一周最大涨幅后趋于稳定。【原文：Oil steadied after the biggest gain in a week as traders weighed the outlook for Venezuela, while concerns about a global glut persisted.】

item.title: 交易商将目光从委内瑞拉风险转向美国数据，黄金保持稳定
item.description: 由于交易商将目光从委内瑞拉的紧张局势转向美国一系列繁忙的经济数据，黄金走势平稳。【原文：Gold steadied, as traders looked beyond tensions in Venezuela toward a busy lineup of economic data in the US.】

item.title: 博思格钢铁提出 88 亿美元收购要约后股价大涨
item.description: 博思格钢铁有限公司（BlueScope Steel Ltd. ）股价在悉尼大涨，此前该公司表示正在考虑美国钢铁制造商钢铁动力公司（Steel Dynamics Inc.【原文：BlueScope Steel Ltd. shares surged in Sydney, after the company said it was considering a A$13.2 billion ($8.8 billion) takeover bid by US steelmaker Steel Dynamics Inc. and Australian conglomerate SGH Ltd.】
